name: Stab Caesar Simulator
description:
Born too late to stab caesar,
Born too early to time travel and then stab caesar,
Born just in time to play a little minigame about stabbing caesar.

how to play:

  1. click or press space to stab caesar ad naeuseum.
  2. contemplate your actions.
  3. experience catharsis.

Why to play:

  • celebrate this auspiscious occasion
  • experience what bringing death to tyrants might be like
  • see what i've been up to
